meanings.definition: The quality or state of being intractable.
meanings.sent1: The intractabilities of the situation made it impossible to find a solution.
meanings.sent2: Her intractabilities at work often caused conflicts with her colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The intractabilities of the stubborn computer made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The intractabilities of the wild horse were finally tamed by the skilled trainer.
meanings.sent5: The intractabilities of the maze puzzled the young explorers.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being difficult to manage or control.
meanings.sent1: The teacher struggled with the intractabilities of the rowdy students.
meanings.sent2: The intractabilities of the project delayed its completion.
meanings.sent3: The intractabilities of the mischievous puppy always led to chaos.
meanings.sent4: The intractabilities of the storm left a trail of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The intractabilities of the traffic jam tested everyone's patience.
